name: WebDragDestinationAction
desc: Actions that the destination object of a drag operation can perform.

items.name: static var DHTML: WebDragDestinationAction
items.desc: Allows DHTML (such as JavaScript) to handle the drag.

items.name: static var edit: WebDragDestinationAction
items.desc: Allows editable documents to be changed by the drag operation.

items.name: static var load: WebDragDestinationAction
items.desc: Allows the drag operation to change the location.

items.name: static var any: WebDragDestinationAction
items.desc: Allows any defined action to occur.
